testcase.classname: Full Signup, Login, and Cleanup Flow
testcase.name: Verify address details in checkout page
testcase.system-out: Given User launches the browser.............................................passed And User navigates to "http://automationexercise.com".......................passed Then Home page should be visible successfully...............................passed When the user clicks on 'Signup / Login' button.............................passed And fills in all required details to create a new account...................passed Then 'ACCOUNT CREATED!' message should be visible after successfull signup..passed And the user clicks the 'Continue' button after signup......................passed Then 'Logged in as Rahul' should be visible at the top after signup.........passed When the user adds products to the cart.....................................passed And clicks the 'View Cart' button to check the cart.........................passed Then the cart page should be displayed......................................passed When the user clicks on 'Proceed To Checkout' for reviewing address.........passed Then the delivery address should match the registration address.............passed And the billing address should match the registration address...............passed When the user clicks the 'Delete Account' button after reviewing address....passed Then 'ACCOUNT DELETED!' message should be displayed on page.................passed And the user clicks the 'Continue' button finally...........................passed
